short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any webpage with GPT-3 API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that lets you quickly obtain a summary of content. Powered by advanced natural language processing technology, Summarize uses GPT-3 API to generate accurate and concise summaries of the most important information, so you can get the gist of it in seconds.
